desc: The Bastion Gallery prides ourselves on showcasing the very best of Irish Design & Makers. Established in 1990 by Katie McCay in the old drapery shop. Katie's family have been trading in the store since the mid-1800s, stocking a selection of gifts and jewellery both designed and made in Ireland.

layout.text: Bricks & mortar store Open Wednesday to Saturday 12:30 to 5: 30-Shop online 24/7
